inst✝ : DecidableEq α
Sₗ Sᵣ : StandardRepr α Z2
hXY : Sₗ.X ⫗ Sᵣ.Y

valid : (standardRepr1sumComposition hXY hYX).2
I : Set α
hI : I ⊆ (standardRepr1sumComposition hXY hYX).1.toMatroid.E
linearlyI :
  I ⊆ (standardRepr1sumComposition hXY hYX).1.X ∪ (standardRepr1sumComposition hXY hYX).1.Y ∧
    LinearIndepOn Z2 (Matrix.transpose fun x => (1 ◫ (standardRepr1sumComposition hXY hYX).1.B) x ∘ Subtype.toSum)
      (Subtype.val ⁻¹' I)
⊢ (True ∧
      LinearIndepOn Z2 (Matrix.transpose fun x => (1 ◫ Sₗ.B) x ∘ Subtype.toSum) (Subtype.val ⁻¹' (I ∩ (Sₗ.X ∪ Sₗ.Y)))) ∧
    (True ∧
        LinearIndepOn Z2 (Matrix.transpose fun x => (1 ◫ Sᵣ.B) x ∘ Subtype.toSum)
          (Subtype.val ⁻¹' (I ∩ (Sᵣ.X ∪ Sᵣ.Y)))) ∧
      I ⊆ Sₗ.X ∪ Sₗ.Y ∪ (Sᵣ.X ∪ Sᵣ.Y)

α : Type
inst✝ : DecidableEq α
X Y : Set α
Q : Matrix ↑X ↑Y ℚ
x' y₀ y₁ : α
hQ : Q.IsTotallyUnimodular
hx' : x' ∈ X
hy₀ : y₀ ∈ Y
hy₁ : y₁ ∈ Y
hyy : y₀ ≠ y₁
hQy₀ : Q ⟨x', hx'⟩ ⟨y₀, hy₀⟩ = 1
hQy₁ : Q ⟨x', hx'⟩ ⟨y₁, hy₁⟩ = 1
hQy : ∀ (y : ↑Y), ↑y ≠ y₀ ∧ ↑y ≠ y₁ → Q ⟨x', hx'⟩ y = 0
⊢ let c₀ := fun j => Q (⋯.elem j) ⟨y₀, hy₀⟩;
  let c₁ := fun j => Q (⋯.elem j) ⟨y₁, hy₁⟩;
  let Q' := Q.submatrix ⋯.elem ⋯.elem;
  (Q' ◫ ▮c₀ ◫ ▮c₁ ◫ ▮(c₀ - c₁)).IsTotallyUnimodular

      { data := bitvec_to_string.chars bv.toNat [] } =
    bv

message_content : String

          else pure none).neverFails ∧

            if

            else {none},
          OracleComp.neverFails
              (@simulation_setup.match_1 (fun maybeVerifiedMsg => OracleComp unifSpec (Option SimulationData)) x_1

                        (Context.mk (1001#256) (1002#256) 1730230302 123) x)
                      123456789#256))) ∧

                    (fun _ => pure none) fun verified_msg =>
                    pure
                      (some

⊢ (do

      forIn js (QuerySeed.addValues x fun x => []) fun j r =>

    do

      let a ←

                (fun a_1 => ForInStep.yield (QuerySeed.addValues a_1 b)) <$> replicate (qc a) ($ᵗspec.range a)

          match a with

            (fun a => ForInStep.yield (QuerySeed.addValues a b)) <$> replicate (qc js) ($ᵗspec.range js)
          | ForInStep.done b => pure (ForInStep.done b)] =

hBᵣ'✝ : Bᵣ'.IsTotallyUnimodular
hXX : Xₗ ∩ Xᵣ = x₀ ᕃ x₁ ᕃ {x₂}
hYY : Yₗ ∩ Yᵣ = y₀ ᕃ y₁ ᕃ {y₂}
hBₗ' :
  (Bₗ'.submatrix3x3mems ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₀ ∨
    (Bₗ'.submatrix3x3mems ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₁
hBᵣ' :
  (Bᵣ'.submatrix3x3mems ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₀ ∨
    (Bᵣ'.submatrix3x3mems ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯ ⋯).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₁
⊢ match hXX.inter3all with
  | ((x₀ₗ, x₁ₗ, x₂ₗ), x₀ᵣ, x₁ᵣ, x₂ᵣ) =>
    match hYY.inter3all with
    | ((y₀ₗ, y₁ₗ, y₂ₗ), y₀ᵣ, y₁ᵣ, y₂ᵣ) =>
      let Bₗ := Bₗ'.toCanonicalSigning x₀ₗ x₁ₗ x₂ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ;
      let Bᵣ := Bᵣ'.toCanonicalSigning x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ y₂ᵣ;
      let D₀ₗ := Bₗ.submatrix2x2 x₀ₗ x₁ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ;
      let Dₗ := Bₗ.submatrix2x7 x₀ₗ x₁ₗ y₀ y₁ y₂;
      let Dᵣ := Bᵣ.submatrix7x2 x₀ x₁ x₂ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ;
      (Bₗ.drop2rows1col x₀ x₁ y₂ ⊟ (⊞ Dₗ D₀ₗ(Dᵣ * D₀ₗ⁻¹ * Dₗ)Dᵣ).submatrix mapX mapY).IsTotallyUnimodular

X : Sequent
W : Type
M : KripkeModel W
v w : W
side : Side
B : List Sequent
next : (Y : Sequent) → Y ∈ B → LocalTableau Y
α : Program
v_α_w : relate M α v w
L R : List Formula
O : Olf
v_t : (M, v)⊨(L, R, O)
F : List Formula
δ : List Program
_in_H : (F, δ) ∈ H α
v_F : ∀ f ∈ F, evaluate M v f
v_δ_w : relateSeq M δ v w
χ' : LoadFormula
w_nξ : (M, w)⊨~''(AnyFormula.loaded χ')
IH :
  ∀ (Y : Sequent) (a : Y ∈ B) (α : Program),
    relate M α v w →
      (M, v)⊨Y →
        (~''(AnyFormula.loaded (⌊α⌋AnyFormula.loaded χ'))).in_side side Y →
          ∃ Y_1 ∈ endNodesOf (next Y a),
            (M, v)⊨Y_1 ∧
              (Y_1.isFree = true ∨
                ∃ F γ,
                  (~''(AnyFormula.loadBoxes γ (AnyFormula.loaded χ'))).in_side side Y_1 ∧
                    relateSeq M γ v w ∧
                      (∀ f ∈ F, evaluate M v f) ∧
                        (F, γ) ∈ H α ∧ (Y_1.without (~''(AnyFormula.loadBoxes γ (AnyFormula.loaded χ')))).isFree = true)
negLoad_in : (~''(AnyFormula.loaded (⌊α⌋AnyFormula.loaded χ'))).in_side side (L, R, O)
α'_not_atomic : ¬α.isAtomic
precons : ∅.Subperm L ∧ ∅.Subperm R ∧ some (Sum.inl (~'⌊α⌋AnyFormula.loaded χ')) ⊆ O
B_def_apply_r_LRO :
  B = applyLocalRule (LocalRule.loadedL (⌊α⌋AnyFormula.loaded χ') (LoadRule.dia α'_not_atomic)) (L, R, O)
claim : (L ++ F, R, some (Sum.inl (~'⌊⌊δ⌋⌋χ'))) ∈ B
⊢ sorry ∈ endNodesOf (next (L ++ F, R, some (Sum.inl (~'⌊⌊δ⌋⌋χ'))) ⋯)

            StateT.modifyGet fun s =>

                { offset := s.offset + ElaboratedCircuit.local_length unit bit,
                  withLength := s.withLength.subcircuit (Boolean.circuit.to_subcircuit s.offset bit) }))
          (ConstantLawfulCircuits.from_constant_length (fun a => inferInstance) (Gadgets.ToBits.main._proof_3 p prime))
          { offset := k + n,
            withLength :=
              (Operations.empty k).witness n fun eval =>
                Vector.ofFn fun i =>
                  if (ZMod.val (Expression.eval eval x_var)).testBit ↑i = true then 1 else 0 }).2.offset,
    (Circuit.forEach (Vector.mapRange n fun i => var { index := k + i })
          (fun bit =>
            StateT.modifyGet fun s =>
              (PUnit.unit,
                { offset := s.offset + ElaboratedCircuit.local_length unit bit,
                  withLength := s.withLength.subcircuit (Boolean.circuit.to_subcircuit s.offset bit) }))
          (ConstantLawfulCircuits.from_constant_length (fun a => inferInstance) (Gadgets.ToBits.main._proof_3 p prime))
          { offset := k + n,
            withLength :=
              (Operations.empty k).witness n fun eval =>
                Vector.ofFn fun i =>
                  if (ZMod.val (Expression.eval eval x_var)).testBit ↑i = true then 1 else 0 }).2.withLength,
    (Equality.circuit id).to_subcircuit
      (Circuit.forEach (Vector.mapRange n fun i => var { index := k + i })
            (fun bit =>
              StateT.modifyGet fun s =>
                (PUnit.unit,
                  { offset := s.offset + ElaboratedCircuit.local_length unit bit,
                    withLength := s.withLength.subcircuit (Boolean.circuit.to_subcircuit s.offset bit) }))
            (ConstantLawfulCircuits.from_constant_length (fun a => inferInstance)
              (Gadgets.ToBits.main._proof_3 p prime))
            { offset := k + n,
              withLength :=
                (Operations.empty k).witness n fun eval =>
                  Vector.ofFn fun i =>
                    if (ZMod.val (Expression.eval eval x_var)).testBit ↑i = true then 1 else 0 }).2.offset
      (x_var, Fin.foldl n (fun acc x => acc + var { index := k + ↑x } * Expression.const (2 ^ ↑x)) 0) with
  | m, Operations.empty .(m), s =>
    Expression.eval env x_var =
      Expression.eval env (Fin.foldl n (fun acc x => acc + var { index := k + ↑x } * Expression.const (2 ^ ↑x)) 0)
  | x, x_1, s =>
    Circuit.constraints_hold.soundness env
        (Circuit.forEach (Vector.mapRange n fun i => var { index := k + i })
              (fun bit =>
                StateT.modifyGet fun s =>
                  (PUnit.unit,
                    { offset := s.offset + ElaboratedCircuit.local_length unit bit,
                      withLength := s.withLength.subcircuit (Boolean.circuit.to_subcircuit s.offset bit) }))
              (ConstantLawfulCircuits.from_constant_length (fun a => inferInstance)
                (Gadgets.ToBits.main._proof_3 p prime))
              { offset := k + n,
                withLength :=
                  (Operations.empty k).witness n fun eval =>
                    Vector.ofFn fun i =>
                      if (ZMod.val (Expression.eval eval x_var)).testBit ↑i = true then 1 else 0 }).2.withLength ∧
      Expression.eval env x_var =
        Expression.eval env (Fin.foldl n (fun acc x => acc + var { index := k + ↑x } * Expression.const (2 ^ ↑x)) 0)

⊢ (do
      let x ← replicate (qc j) ($ᵗspec.range j)
      forIn js (QuerySeed.addValues x fun x => []) fun j r =>
          replicate (qc j) ($ᵗspec.range j) >>= pure ∘ fun a => ForInStep.yield (QuerySeed.addValues a r)) =
    do

      ((LinearMap.mul' R A) (x✝¹ * y✝) + (LinearMap.mul' R A) (y✝¹ * y✝)) =
    (LinearMap.mul' R A) x✝¹ * (LinearMap.mul' R A) x✝ + (LinearMap.mul' R A) y✝¹ * (LinearMap.mul' R A) x✝ +
      ((LinearMap.mul' R A) x✝¹ * (LinearMap.mul' R A) y✝ + (LinearMap.mul' R A) y✝¹ * (LinearMap.mul' R A) y✝)

      (Bₗ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ₗ x₁ₗ x₂ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₀ ∨

h_x1_h : ZMod.val x1_h = ZMod.val x1 / 2 ^ ↑offset
h_x2_l : ZMod.val x2_l = ZMod.val x2 % 2 ^ ↑offset
h_x2_h : ZMod.val x2_h = ZMod.val x2 / 2 ^ ↑offset
h_x3_l : ZMod.val x3_l = ZMod.val x3 % 2 ^ ↑offset
h_x3_h : ZMod.val x3_h = ZMod.val x3 / 2 ^ ↑offset
h_x4_l : ZMod.val x4_l = ZMod.val x4 % 2 ^ ↑offset
h_x4_h : ZMod.val x4_h = ZMod.val x4 / 2 ^ ↑offset
h_x5_l : ZMod.val x5_l = ZMod.val x5 % 2 ^ ↑offset
h_x5_h : ZMod.val x5_h = ZMod.val x5 / 2 ^ ↑offset
h_x6_l : ZMod.val x6_l = ZMod.val x6 % 2 ^ ↑offset
h_x6_h : ZMod.val x6_h = ZMod.val x6 / 2 ^ ↑offset
h_x7_l : ZMod.val x7_l = ZMod.val x7 % 2 ^ ↑offset
h_x7_h : ZMod.val x7_h = ZMod.val x7 / 2 ^ ↑offset
eq0 : x1_l * 2 ^ ↑offset + x0_h + -y0 = 0
eq1 : x2_l * 2 ^ ↑offset + x1_h + -y1 = 0
eq2 : x3_l * 2 ^ ↑offset + x2_h + -y2 = 0
eq3 : x4_l * 2 ^ ↑offset + x3_h + -y3 = 0
eq4 : x5_l * 2 ^ ↑offset + x4_h + -y4 = 0
eq5 : x6_l * 2 ^ ↑offset + x5_h + -y5 = 0
eq6 : x7_l * 2 ^ ↑offset + x6_h + -y6 = 0
eq7 : x0_l * 2 ^ ↑offset + x7_h + -y7 = 0
⊢ let x_val :=
    ZMod.val x0 + ZMod.val x1 * 256 + ZMod.val x2 * 256 ^ 2 + ZMod.val x3 * 256 ^ 3 + ZMod.val x4 * 256 ^ 4 +
          ZMod.val x5 * 256 ^ 5 +
        ZMod.val x6 * 256 ^ 6 +
      ZMod.val x7 * 256 ^ 7;
  let y_val :=
    ZMod.val y0 + ZMod.val y1 * 256 + ZMod.val y2 * 256 ^ 2 + ZMod.val y3 * 256 ^ 3 + ZMod.val y4 * 256 ^ 4 +
          ZMod.val y5 * 256 ^ 5 +
        ZMod.val y6 * 256 ^ 6 +
      ZMod.val y7 * 256 ^ 7;
  y_val = x_val % 2 ^ (↑offset % 64) * 2 ^ (64 - ↑offset % 64) + x_val / 2 ^ (↑offset % 64)

      let Dᵣ := Bᵣ.Dᵣ x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ;
      (Bₗ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ₗ x₁ₗ x₂ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₀ ∨
          (Bₗ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ₗ x₁ₗ x₂ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₁ →
        (Bᵣ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ y₂ᵣ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₀ ∨
            (Bᵣ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ y₂ᵣ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₁ →
          (Bᵣ.Aᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ ◫ matrix3sumBottomLeft x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ Dₗ D₀ Dᵣ).IsTotallyUnimodular

α : Type
inst✝⁴ : DecidableEq α
Xₗ Yₗ Xᵣ Yᵣ : Set α
x₀ x₁ x₂ y₀ y₁ y₂ : α
inst✝³ : (x : α) → Decidable (x ∈ Xₗ)
inst✝² : (x : α) → Decidable (x ∈ Xᵣ)
inst✝¹ : (y : α) → Decidable (y ∈ Yₗ)
inst✝ : (y : α) → Decidable (y ∈ Yᵣ)
Bₗ' : Matrix ↑Xₗ ↑Yₗ ℚ
Bᵣ' : Matrix ↑Xᵣ ↑Yᵣ ℚ
hBₗ' : Bₗ'.IsTotallyUnimodular
hBᵣ' : Bᵣ'.IsTotallyUnimodular
hXX : Xₗ ∩ Xᵣ = x₀ ᕃ x₁ ᕃ {x₂}
hYY : Yₗ ∩ Yᵣ = y₀ ᕃ y₁ ᕃ {y₂}
⊢ match hXX.inter3all with
  | ((x₀ₗ, x₁ₗ, x₂ₗ), x₀ᵣ, x₁ᵣ, x₂ᵣ) =>
    match hYY.inter3all with
    | ((y₀ₗ, y₁ₗ, y₂ₗ), y₀ᵣ, y₁ᵣ, y₂ᵣ) =>
      let Bₗ := Bₗ'.toCanonicalSigning x₀ₗ x₁ₗ x₂ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ;
      let Bᵣ := Bᵣ'.toCanonicalSigning x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ y₂ᵣ;
      let D₀ := Bₗ.D₀ x₀ₗ x₁ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ;
      let Dₗ := Bₗ.Dₗ x₀ₗ x₁ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ;
      let Dᵣ := Bᵣ.Dᵣ x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ;
      (Bₗ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ₗ x₁ₗ x₂ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₀ ∨
          (Bₗ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ₗ x₁ₗ x₂ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₁ →
        (Bᵣ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ y₂ᵣ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₀ ∨
            (Bᵣ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ y₂ᵣ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₁ →
          (Bₗ.Aₗ x₀ₗ x₁ₗ y₂ₗ ⊟ matrix3sumBottomLeft x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ Dₗ D₀ Dᵣ).IsTotallyUnimodular

α : Type
inst✝⁴ : DecidableEq α
Xₗ Yₗ Xᵣ Yᵣ : Set α
x₀ x₁ x₂ y₀ y₁ y₂ : α
inst✝³ : (x : α) → Decidable (x ∈ Xₗ)
inst✝² : (x : α) → Decidable (x ∈ Xᵣ)
inst✝¹ : (y : α) → Decidable (y ∈ Yₗ)
inst✝ : (y : α) → Decidable (y ∈ Yᵣ)
Bₗ : Matrix ↑Xₗ ↑Yₗ ℚ
Bᵣ : Matrix ↑Xᵣ ↑Yᵣ ℚ
hXX : Xₗ ∩ Xᵣ = x₀ ᕃ x₁ ᕃ {x₂}
hYY : Yₗ ∩ Yᵣ = y₀ ᕃ y₁ ᕃ {y₂}
hBₗ : Bₗ.IsTotallyUnimodular
hBᵣ : Bᵣ.IsTotallyUnimodular
⊢ Matrix.IsTotallyUnimodular (matrix3sumCanonicalSigning Bₗ Bᵣ hXX hYY)
⊢ ∀ ⦃a b : Formula⦄, a ≈ b → (~a) ≈ (~b)
⊢ ∀ ⦃a₁ a₂ : Formula⦄, a₁ ≈ a₂ → ∀ ⦃b₁ b₂ : Formula⦄, b₁ ≈ b₂ → a₁⋀b₁ ≈ a₂⋀b₂

                        (~''(AnyFormula.loadBoxes γ (AnyFormula.normal φ))).in_side side Y_1 ∧

    true

Xₗ Yₗ Xᵣ Yᵣ : Set α
x₀ x₁ x₂ y₀ y₁ y₂ : α
inst✝³ : (x : α) → Decidable (x ∈ Xₗ)
inst✝² : (x : α) → Decidable (x ∈ Xᵣ)
inst✝¹ : (y : α) → Decidable (y ∈ Yₗ)
inst✝ : (y : α) → Decidable (y ∈ Yᵣ)
Bₗ : Matrix ↑Xₗ ↑Yₗ ℚ
Bᵣ : Matrix ↑Xᵣ ↑Yᵣ ℚ
hXX : Xₗ ∩ Xᵣ = x₀ ᕃ x₁ ᕃ {x₂}
hYY : Yₗ ∩ Yᵣ = y₀ ᕃ y₁ ᕃ {y₂}
hBₗ : ∀ (i : ↑Xₗ) (j : ↑Yₗ), Bₗ i j ∈ SignType.cast.range
hBᵣ : ∀ (i : ↑Xᵣ) (j : ↑Yᵣ), Bᵣ i j ∈ SignType.cast.range
x₀ₗ : ↑Xₗ := ⟨x₀, ⋯⟩
x₀ᵣ : ↑Xᵣ := ⟨x₀, ⋯⟩
x₁ₗ : ↑Xₗ := ⟨x₁, ⋯⟩
x₁ᵣ : ↑Xᵣ := ⟨x₁, ⋯⟩
x₂ₗ : ↑Xₗ := ⟨x₂, ⋯⟩
x₂ᵣ : ↑Xᵣ := ⟨x₂, ⋯⟩
y₀ₗ : ↑Yₗ := ⟨y₀, ⋯⟩
y₀ᵣ : ↑Yᵣ := ⟨y₀, ⋯⟩
y₁ₗ : ↑Yₗ := ⟨y₁, ⋯⟩
y₁ᵣ : ↑Yᵣ := ⟨y₁, ⋯⟩
y₂ₗ : ↑Yₗ := ⟨y₂, ⋯⟩
y₂ᵣ : ↑Yᵣ := ⟨y₂, ⋯⟩
Aₗ : Matrix (↑(Xₗ.drop2 x₀ₗ x₁ₗ)) (↑(Yₗ.drop1 y₂ₗ)) Z2 := Bₗ.support.Aₗ x₀ₗ x₁ₗ y₂ₗ
Dₗ : Matrix (Fin 2) (↑(Yₗ.drop3 y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ)) Z2 := Bₗ.support.Dₗ x₀ₗ x₁ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ
D₀ : Matrix (Fin 2) (Fin 2) Z2 := Bₗ.support.D₀ x₀ₗ x₁ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ
Dᵣ : Matrix (↑(Xᵣ.drop3 x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ)) (Fin 2) Z2 := Bᵣ.support.Dᵣ x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ
Aᵣ : Matrix (↑(Xᵣ.drop1 x₂ᵣ)) (↑(Yᵣ.drop2 y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ)) Z2 := Bᵣ.support.Aᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ
hBₗ₀₀ : |Bₗ x₀ₗ y₀ₗ| = 1
hBₗ₀₂ : |Bₗ x₀ₗ y₂ₗ| = 1
hBₗ₂₀ : |Bₗ x₂ₗ y₀ₗ| = 1
hBₗ₁₂ : |Bₗ x₁ₗ y₂ₗ| = 1
hBₗ₂₁ : |Bₗ x₂ₗ y₁ₗ| = 1
hBᵣ₀₀ : |Bᵣ x₀ᵣ y₀ᵣ| = 1
hBᵣ₀₂ : |Bᵣ x₀ᵣ y₂ᵣ| = 1
hBᵣ₂₀ : |Bᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ| = 1
hBᵣ₁₂ : |Bᵣ x₁ᵣ y₂ᵣ| = 1
hBᵣ₂₁ : |Bᵣ x₂ᵣ y₁ᵣ| = 1
iᵣ : ↑(Xᵣ.drop1 ⟨x₂, ⋯⟩)
jₗ : ↑(Yₗ.drop1 ⟨y₂, ⋯⟩)
hx₀ : ↑iᵣ = x₀
hy₀ : ¬↑jₗ = y₀
hy₁ : ¬↑jₗ = y₁
⊢ ↑jₗ ≠ y₂

      let D₀ := Bᵣ.D₀ x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ;
      let Dₗ := Bₗ.Dₗ x₀ₗ x₁ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ;

      (Bₗ'.submatrix3x3 x₀ₗ x₁ₗ x₂ₗ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ).abs = matrix3x3unsigned₀ ∨

          (Bᵣ.Aᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ᵣ y₁ᵣ ◫ matrix3sumBottomLeft x₀ᵣ x₁ᵣ x₂ᵣ y₀ₗ y₁ₗ y₂ₗ Dₗ D₀ Dᵣ).IsTotallyUnimodular

    ∀ {G : Type u} [inst : Group G], FreeGroup G → ∀ (g : G), g ≠ 1 → orderOf g = 0

⊢ (∀ {G : Type u} [inst : Group G], FreeGroup G → ∀ (g : G), g ≠ 1 → orderOf g = 0) →
    ∀ {α : Type u} [inst : DecidableEq α] {x : FreeGroup α}, x ≠ 1 → ¬IsOfFinOrder x

⊢ (∀ {m n : ℕ}, 0 < m → 0 < n → m.gcd n = 1 → ∀ N > m * n, ∃ x y, N = m * x + n * y) →
    ∀ (a b : ℕ), a > 0 → b > 0 → a.Coprime b → ∃ m, ∀ N > m, ∃ x y, N = a * x + b * y

⊢ (∀ (a b : ℕ), a > 0 → b > 0 → a.Coprime b → ∃ m, ∀ N > m, ∃ x y, N = a * x + b * y) →
    ∀ {m n : ℕ}, 0 < m → 0 < n → m.gcd n = 1 → ∀ N > m * n, ∃ x y, N = m * x + n * y

⊢ Unit →
    ∀ {η : Type u_1} (G : Type u_2) [inst : Group G] {Γ : Type u_3} [inst_1 : Group Γ],
      Monoid.IsTorsionFree (G × Γ) → Monoid.IsTorsionFree G ∧ Monoid.IsTorsionFree Γ

n : ℕ

⊢ ∑ j : Fin n, ∑ i : Fin n, W i j * w i * v j = (((toMatrixₛₗ₂' ℝ).symm W) v) w

n : ℕ
net : AsymmetricHopfieldNetwork n
x : HopfieldState n
k : ℕ
h_k_lt_n : k < n
nextIndex : Fin n := ⟨k % n, ⋯⟩
x' : HopfieldState n := updateStateAsym net.weights net.thresholds x nextIndex
i' : Fin n := nextIndex
i'' : Fin n := ⟨(k + 1) % n, ⋯⟩
h_case1 :
  ∑ j : Fin n, (net.weights i' j * if localFieldAsym net x' i' > 0 then 1 else -1) * (x' j).toReal -
      ∑ j : Fin n, (net.weights i' j * if localFieldAsym net x i' > 0 then 1 else -1) * (x j).toReal =
    (∑ j : Fin n,
        (net.weights i' j * if localFieldAsym net x' i' > 0 then 1 else -1) *
          if j = i' then updatedSpinValue net x i' else (x j).toReal) -
      ∑ j : Fin n, (net.weights i' j * if localFieldAsym net x i' > 0 then 1 else -1) * (x j).toReal
Δ₁ : ℝ
h_Δ₁ :
  ∑ j : Fin n, (net.weights i' j * if localFieldAsym net x' i' > 0 then 1 else -1) * (x' j).toReal -
      ∑ j : Fin n, (net.weights i' j * if localFieldAsym net x i' > 0 then 1 else -1) * (x j).toReal =
    Δ₁
Δ₂ : ℝ
h_Δ₂ :
  ∑ j : Fin n, (net.weights i'' j * if localFieldAsym net x' i'' > 0 then 1 else -1) * (x' j).toReal -
      ∑ j : Fin n, net.weights i'' j * (x i'').toReal * (x j).toReal =
    Δ₂
Δ₃ : ℝ
h_Δ₃ :
  (∑ i : Fin n,
      if i ≠ i' ∧ i ≠ i'' then
        ∑ j : Fin n, net.weights i j * (x' i).toReal * (x' j).toReal -
          ∑ j : Fin n, net.weights i j * (x i).toReal * (x j).toReal
      else 0) =
    Δ₃
⊢ potentialFunction net x k =
    ∑ j : Fin n, (net.weights i' j * if localFieldAsym net x i' > 0 then 1 else -1) * (x j).toReal +
        ∑ j : Fin n, net.weights i'' j * (x i'').toReal * (x j).toReal +
      ∑ i : Fin n, if i ≠ i' ∧ i ≠ i'' then ∑ j : Fin n, net.weights i j * (x i).toReal * (x j).toReal else 0
